issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h4. New Feature description
The user wants to be able to start and stop the trace method in android.os.Debug, so they can profile their application in android.

h4. Related Docs

Debug class - http://developer.android.com/reference/android/os/Debug.html
debugging profiling - http://developer.android.com/tools/debugging/debugging-tracing.html

h4. Q&A Question
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/162584/setting-up-profiling-in-titanium
fields.summary: Android: Add support for android.os.Debug.startMethodTracing() and android.os.Debug.stopMethodTracing()
